title: Elsa Hosk bares all backstage at Victoria's Secret show

snippet: Nov 10, 2015 ... File photo shows Elsa Hosk walk the runway during the 2014 Victoria's ... The 27-year-old model, who has worked for fashion's top names like ...
htmlSnippet: Nov 10, 2015 ... File photo shows Elsa Hosk walk the runway during the 2014 Victoria's ... The 27-year-old model, who has worked for fashion's top names like ...

metatags.og:description: Victoria’s Secret model Elsa Hosk, who got promoted to ‘Angel’ status this year, has been photographed backstage in the nuddy, in a lead up to the 2015 Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show at Lexington Avenue Armory in New York City. The steamy photograph features Elsa clutching to the curtains to hide her modesty while posing for fashion photographer Russell James.
